resources.string: Have peace of mind and instantly resolve unexpected issues hassle-free.
Instant premium package assurance for damage, loss, or theft.
Save time and headache reporting unexpected shipment issues.
Easily resolve issues and get a replacement or refund, hassle-free.

Shipped offers shipment protection with tracking services and hassle-free solutions for resolving shipment issues for online purchases that are damaged in transit, lost by the carrier, or stolen immediately after the carrier\'s proof of delivery where Shipped monitors the shipment.
